capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Hagrid's family background and it seems pretty clear that he does indeed have a lineage of wizards. I mean, his parents were both giants, but they had magical abilities too, which is pretty unusual for their kind. And then there's the fact that Hagrid himself has shown some impressive magical skills from a young age...

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Harry the other day and he mentioned that Hagrid is actually an adult. I completely agree with him on this one, I've seen Hagrid myself and he definitely looks like a grown man to me.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've seen Hagrid's beard grow over the years, and I can confidently say he's always been quite the rugged-looking guy.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've seen Hagrid's beard grow so much over the years, it's almost as if he has a few extra inches of hair on his chin. I think that's part of what makes him look so rugged and endearing.
